sense.gloss: frontage, width (of a building, plot of land, etc.)
breadth (e.g. of one's knowledge), scope (e.g. of one's work), range

sdata.j: ↑間口↑↓|まぐち|↓も↑広↑↓ひろ↓いが↑奥行↑↓おくゆ↓きも↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に↑深↑↓ふか↓い。
sdata.e: It's as deep as it is wide.

sdata.j: ↑山口↑↓や|まぐち|↓↑県↑↓けん↓の↑県庁↑↓けんちょう↓↑所在地↑↓しょざいち↓は↑山口↑↓や|まぐち|↓↑市↑↓し↓です。
sdata.e: Yamaguchi Prefecture's capital is Yamaguchi City.
